comments.body: Once all your current PRs have been merged you may wish to update raise a single PR to bulk update the Import check to the form https://github.com/ansible/community/issues/346#issuecomment-461037623
Thanks @gundalow. Yes, we will raise a new PR to cover all of them for sure. Actually it is a very good point to improve usability for the end user.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +910,914 @@    try:
        from fortiosapi import FortiOSAPI
    except ImportError:
        module.fail_json(msg="fortiosapi module is required")
